descriptionNullable: The Customer Sentiment Dataset contains a collection of customer reviews for various products and services. Each review is associated with a sentiment label indicating whether the review is positive (where in Turkish 'Olumlu'), negative (in Turkish 'Olumsuz'), or neutral (in Turkish 'Tarafsiz').
title: Turkish Product Comment - Sentiment Analysis
description: The Customer Sentiment Dataset contains a collection of customer reviews for various products and services. Each review is associated with a sentiment label indicating whether the review is positive (where in Turkish 'Olumlu'), negative (in Turkish 'Olumsuz'), or neutral (in Turkish 'Tarafsiz').
